vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κἀγώ [ᾱ],
Attic dialect crasis for καὶ ἐγώ.
vocabInfos.shortDef: and I, I also, but I
vocabInfos.mediumDef: and I, I also, but I, a crasis of και and ἐγώ, dative, κἀμοι, accusative, κἀμέ
vocabInfos._es_Definition: y yo, pero yo ; yo también ; yo mismo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 和我
2) 而我
3) 我也
4) 尤其是我 (羅 3:7)
5) 若我 (太 26:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 和我
2) 而我
3) 我也
4) 尤其是我 (罗 3:7)
5) 若我 (太 26:15)

vocabInfos._vi_Definition: và tôi; tôi cũng vậy, nhưng tôi
